column4: Sometimes when using Firefox, I click a link and my desktop completely clears, except for my background desktop image??
sounds like a bug.  Can you reproduce the lock up?
also to recover you could try hitting alt+f2 to bring up a run prompt and restart gnome-panel.  Or you could hit ctrl+alt+backspace to restart X
well then probably gnome-panel crashed is all.
if you get a run dialog up you could do something like killall gnome-panel.  It should restart the panel up top on its own.
then just type in killall gnome-panel
why don't you run linux on the old computers
CP/M computer and old 8085/Z80 computers.  No room for Linux.  32k max rom/ram.  64k is a powerhouse :)
once you log in the freenode and identify yourself you are fine.
did you identify yet? /msg nickserv identify <password>  and you should get +ei
I have no problem joining that channel.
its showing you as in that channel
